pages.text: The $(2)Laser Rifle$() is the standard photonic weapon casing. Designed for maximum mobility, photonic weapons built using this casing can be operated on-the-fly by the experienced marksman.$(br2)Upgrading the casing increases the modifier slot count while retaining any previously-installed components.

pages.title: Basic Laser Rifle
pages.text: The most basic model. Features one modifier slot.

pages.title: Advanced Laser Rifle
pages.text: A slightly more advanced model. Features two modifier slots.

pages.title: Elite Laser Rifle
pages.text: A model designed for the elite marksman. Features three modifier slots.

pages.title: Ultimate Laser Rifle
pages.text: The ultimate advancement in photonic weapons technology. Features four modifier slots.
